threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3476 clean ME region
threads.message:
Here is it. Any reason why this needed a clean ME? I doubt you changed a CPU on this board.

Also I fixed 1 of the 3115 boards you sent. Throw away that flux you have there now, Chinese battery acid. I can send you some real NC559 and that does not come from China of course.

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByfhQ_x0v-tZdEd1bklIMUJ0VHc[/url]

threads.message:

al liqued damage was fixed, checked al lines and resitors from and to u6100 and u6110(out of my head) But they al gave Good readings also al lines looked Good and connected.
